bug.author: jeffin143
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue description</denchmark-h>
Tried building mlpack using make, and it throws an error when i run ./bin/mlpack_test <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21286134/76608296-64646b80-653b-11ea-9c43-9cb3c6c9298a.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-h:h4>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Note : This does not happen in fresh install Do the following Clone the repo, create build hit cmake ../ and make mlpack_test and then ./bin/mlpack_test and now create a branch and then again hit make mlpack_test or cmake ../ and mlpack_test and finally ./bin/mlpack_test and you will get the error <denchmark-h:h4>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Should compile without any error <denchmark-h:h4>Actual behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21286134/76608296-64646b80-653b-11ea-9c43-9cb3c6c9298a.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Note : I didn't try to debug it, Since I was working on something else, I will take a look later, but happened to make a couple of times strange now it happens for fresh install too, So I have to debug this first and then move ahead :-p
I will try to look into this
/usr/local/opt/openblas/lib/libopenblasp-r0.3.7.dylib I have r.0.3.9 I am not sure why is it taking 0.3.7
A temporary fix -> But I am not sure, Why does this occurs ln -s /usr/local/opt/openblas/lib/libopenblasp-r0.3.9.dylib /usr/local/opt/openblas/lib/libopenblasp-r0.3.7.dylib
Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jeffin143>@jeffin143</denchmark-link> I tried to reproduce it nothing went wrong. I am using ubuntu maybe this is osx specific issue.
